SELECT a.footprint_id,a.product_id,b.product_name,b.shelve_state,c.price,d.product_image image, a.selected,c.original_price,a.shop_id,a.sku_id from cere_buyer_footprint a LEFT JOIN cere_shop_product b ON a.product_id=b.product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.price,b.product_id,a.original_price from cere_product_sku a,cere_shop_product b where a.product_id=b.product_id GROUP BY a.product_id) c ON b.product_id=c.product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT a.product_image,b.product_id from cere_product_image a,cere_shop_product b where a.product_id=b.product_id GROUP BY a.product_id) d ON b.product_id=d.product_id where a.buyer_user_id=#{buyerUserId} and a.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{createTime},'%') GROUP BY a.product_id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
